name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: QMP, TMP, SWMS & ITP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: QMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, ITP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencement of excavation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Area has been set out in accordance with the drawings
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
○ Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task.
○ Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Material classified as silt, either before or after compaction, is not acceptable as Type A material without stablisation to the satisfaction of the Superintendent
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Superintendent satisfied with Stabilisation, Signed ITP/ records
FREQUENCY: Prior construction of the regulating layer
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Prior to construction of the regulating layer, the areas of rock subgrade shall be presented to the Superintendent for acceptance.
○ Any necessary amendments to the subsurface drainage design including transverse subsurface drainage at the interfaces shall be presented to Superintendent for review.
INSPECTION/TEST METHOD: Site Inspection/ Document Review
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Superintendent acceptance, Signed ITP
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Where Unsuitable material is encountered, proposed in-situ treatment must be submitted to the superintendent for review.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Where groundwater is encountered the contractor shall notify the superintendent and submit proposed action for review.
○ The Contractor shall submit any necessary approvals from relevant authorities for the treatment and disposal of this groundwater.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Proof rolls to be conducted in accordance with Section 173 of the VicRoads Standard Specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
